name: School Bus Simulator Drive 21
description:
The holidays are over and the children must get back to school! Be the best School bus driver in a beautiful big city, with the latest game - School Bus Simulator Drive 21.
Detailed school buses, realistic interiors and the beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like driving a real school bus!
School bus transport driver 2021 works on the concept of a real school bus. In this game you have to pick up students from the bus stop and get them to school on time.
Drive carefully to the pick-up spot, open the bus doors, let the students board the bus and then drop them to their school. Drive carefully because every time you crash, your bus will get damaged and the students will be hurt! Make sure you drop your students before your school bus is completely broken and damaged!
School Bus Transport Driver 2021 is all about your school bus driving skills! Each level of School Bus Transport Driver 2021 is more challenging and more exciting than the previous one! Your students are waiting for you!

FEATURES of School Bus Simulator Drive 21
Real life traffic
Beautiful city environment
Challenging missions
Drive different types of buses
Realistic bus physics
Stunning 3D graphics
Realistic bus interiors
Realistic game sound effects
Realistic controls

Come and play the most exciting and addictive school bus simulator game - School Bus Simulator Drive 21.
Explore the beautiful city in your school bus and become the king of the road!
Get School Bus Transport Driver 2021 now!
